doc:
Al Hodge https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Al_Hodge 0 Albert E. Hodge (April 18, 1912 – March 19, 1979) was an American actor best known for playing space adventurer Captain Video on the DuMont Television Network from December 15, 1950, to April 1, 1955. He played the Green Hornet on radio from January 1936 until January 1943. Albert_E._Hodge ( April_18_,_1912 – March_19_,_1979 ) was an_American_actor best_known for playing space_adventurer_Captain_Video on the_DuMont_Television_Network from December_15_,_1950 , to April_1_,_1955 . He played the_Green_Hornet on radio from January_1936 until January_1943 .
